expo.name: TravelJoy

infoPlist.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: TravelJoy needs your location to provide personalized travel recommendations and show nearby attractions.
infoPlist.NSLocationAlwaysUsageDescription: TravelJoy uses your location to enhance your travel experience with real-time updates.
infoPlist.NSCameraUsageDescription: TravelJoy needs camera access to let you capture and share travel moments.
infoPlist.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: TravelJoy needs access to your photos to let you add images to your trips.

expo.description: AI-powered travel planning made simple. Create personalized multi-day itineraries with smart recommendations for activities, dining, and transportation.
